channel.title: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read
channel.description:
Ok my one big problem is, just getting my new source online so people may connect to my No-ip. where do i go to make it so people can connect to my Ip on my new Server (source). Thanks.
Note: my Complier problem is fixed, still need help with my source problem, with people connecting to it with my no-ip, how to set it up in your server source.

item.title: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read
item.dc:creator: @pimpingallover pimpingallover
item.description:
@pimpingallover wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:7, topic:245293”]well are u able 2 connect? if not… check server.java for wat the port is, search for 43594, if no results just give up on that source and use a dif 1

if so, post that line[/quote]

Here the segment of it:

public static server clientHandler = null;			// handles all the clients
public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null;
public static boolean shutdownServer = false;		// set this to true in order to shut down and kill the server
public static boolean shutdownClientHandler;			// signals ClientHandler to shut down
public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default        <------ comes up when searching 43594.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 10:32:36 pm[/size][hr]Ok my one big problem is, just getting my new source online so people may connect to my No-ip. where do i go to make it so people can connect to my Ip on my new Server (source). Thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

well are u able 2 connect? if not… check server.java for wat the port is, search for 43594, if no results just give up on that source and use a dif 1

if so, post that line

item.source: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read

item.title: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read
item.dc:creator: @pimpingallover pimpingallover
item.description:
@pimpingallover wrote:

[quote=“the soul, post:4, topic:245293”][quote author=pimpingallover link=topic=321716.msg2544079#msg2544079 date=1227153220]

That means there were no errors compiling.
[/quote] Er… I mean so people can connect to my server, i am recently changing soruces, but i am soo stupid, i forgot how to make it so people can connect to my source. Thats what i am trying to mean, not change with people connect with, but the ip they connect to to play on my server.

Thats not my problem, With the Complier, the " Note: " Things, is their an issue with thoses? And the other problem is the Ip problem for the soruce, i am using a open source for " Figmentscape" and i am sorta remembering changing the connection ip for it, in the “Client.Java” but i can’t seem to find out how yet… Anyone know?

You can’t change the IP people use to connect through the client.java.

And the “Note:” things means that you’ve compiled successfully without errors.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 10:06:50 pm[/size][hr]Noo, im trying to change the ip in the source, it was figmentscapes i think, or was it the 127.0 one, anywas, i was asking if i need to change that, i already got a no-ip and port, " I am switching sources". Anywho, the problem is that i cannt connect to my server, using my new source, i have my own client, and all, its already set up, and was working with the preveious source, but now i cant connect to the source i got now.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read

item.title: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

the note stuff doens’t mean anything just ignore it, those r just lil side notes that mean nothing

and to change ur ip, u cant lol
maybe ur trying 2 find out ur ip? check this site: www.ipchicken.org

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read

item.title: Need a little help please. Thank you :P -- Read
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“pimpingallover, post:3, topic:245293”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=321716.msg2544063#msg2544063 date=1227152898]
That means there were no errors compiling.
[/quote]

Thats not my problem, With the Complier, the " Note: " Things, is their an issue with thoses? And the other problem is the Ip problem for the soruce, i am using a open source for " Figmentscape" and i am sorta remembering changing the connection ip for it, in the “Client.Java” but i can’t seem to find out how yet… Anyone know? :P[/quote]
You can’t change the IP people use to connect through the client.java.

And the “Note:” things means that you’ve compiled successfully without errors.

Read full topic
